segments.text: I plan to emigrate to Canada .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Have you found a suitable job ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: No . But it is said the welfare in Canada is very good .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: But as to me finding a good job is the most important thing .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Maybe you are right , so I will try my best to find a suitable job .
segments.speaker: S1
